allow:
Bash(quinn-code-writer "Feature: UserCards Adapter Implementation - Implementation of UserCards adapter layer for managing user card collections in Cosmos DB. This adapter will handle write operations (Scribe) for adding cards to a user''s collection, following the established CQRS pattern with Commands folder structure.

User Story: Define the core interfaces for the UserCards adapter service. This includes the main composite interface and specialized command interface following established adapter patterns. Main composite interface IUserCardsAdapterService defined. Specialized interface IUserCardsCommandAdapter defined. Interfaces follow established patterns with proper documentation. Composite interface pattern inheriting from specialized interfaces. XML documentation explaining design decisions. Public interface for aggregator layer consumption. Command operations using IOperationResponse pattern.

Task: TSK-IMPL 3: Create Main Adapter Interface. Location: src/Lib.Adapter.UserCards/Apis/IUserCardsAdapterService.cs. Reference: Copy from src/Lib.Adapter.User/Apis/IUserAdapterService.cs:1-30. Pattern: Composite interface pattern inheriting from specialized interfaces. Modifications: Replace User with UserCards, inherit from IUserCardsCommandAdapter, update documentation.")

Bash(echo "quinn-code-writer: Implementation of TSK-IMPL 7: Create Container Name Primitive

Feature: Implementation of UserCards adapter layer for managing user card collections in Cosmos DB. This adapter will handle write operations (Scribe) for adding cards to a user''s collection, following the established CQRS pattern with Commands folder structure. The adapter layer follows established patterns from existing adapters (Cards, Artists, Sets, User) and integrates with the Lib.Cosmos infrastructure layer.

User Story: Create the Cosmos DB container infrastructure components including container definition, adapter, and name primitive. Acceptance Criteria: Container definition created with proper partition key, Container adapter created for Cosmos operations, Container name primitive created.

Task: Implementation task for Create Container Name Primitive following Cosmos infrastructure patterns.

Context: This is for UserCards Cosmos container infrastructure following patterns in src/Lib.Cosmos/ for container name primitives.")

Bash(quinn-code-writer "Feature: Implementation of UserCards adapter layer for managing user card collections in Cosmos DB. This adapter will handle write operations (Scribe) for adding cards to a user''s collection, following the established CQRS pattern with Commands folder structure. The adapter layer follows established patterns from existing adapters (Cards, Artists, Sets, User) and integrates with the Lib.Cosmos infrastructure layer.

User Story: Create the Cosmos DB container infrastructure components including container definition, adapter, and name primitive. Acceptance Criteria: Container definition created with proper partition key, Container adapter created for Cosmos operations, Container name primitive created.

Context: This is for UserCards Cosmos container infrastructure following patterns in src/Lib.Cosmos/ for container name primitives.")

Bash("Feature: Implementation of UserCards adapter layer for managing user card collections in Cosmos DB. This adapter will handle write operations (Scribe) for adding cards to a user''s collection, following the established CQRS pattern with Commands folder structure. 

UserCards Cosmos schema has been defined:
UserCards
{
  partition: userId
  id: cardId
  cardId: card.Id
  userId: user.Id
  setId: card.set.Id
  collected: [
    {
      finish: {nonfoil|foil|etched}
      special: {none|altered|signed|proof}
      count: {count}
    }
  ]
}

The adapter layer follows established patterns from existing adapters (Cards, Artists, Sets, User) and integrates with the Lib.Cosmos infrastructure layer.

Pattern Reference: src/Lib.Adapter.User/ - Use as primary template for adapter structure
CQRS Reference: src/Lib.Adapter.Cards/ - Reference for CQRS folder structure (Queries folder)
Cosmos Integration: src/Lib.Adapter.Scryfall.Cosmos/ - Where Cosmos Items and operators live
Infrastructure: src/Lib.Cosmos/ - Core Cosmos infrastructure components

Architecture Goals:
- CQRS pattern with Commands folder structure
- MicroObjects principles throughout
- IOperationResponse from Lib.Shared.Invocation
- Proper layer separation and dependency injection

User Story: Implementation of Implement UserCards Command Adapter following established adapter patterns and MicroObjects principles.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Implementation follows established patterns
- All tests pass
- Code quality meets standards

Task: Implementation task 1 for Implement UserCards Command Adapter.")
